LanguageData.Mech_Scyther.label: Scyther
LanguageData.Mech_Scyther.description: Scythers are fast, spindly, armored human-sized combat Mechanoids. They usually carry one primary ranged weapon, and their bodies are adorned with two articulated blades to craft them deadly in melee combat. They don't use cover. They are best handled by concentrated, overwhelming force.
